text: Kroměříž () is a town in the Zlín Region in the Czech Republic. It is the capital of the Kroměříž District. About 28,000 people live there. It is known for the Kroměříž Castle with castle gardens, which was made a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1998. == Twin towns == Kroměříž is twinned with: * Châteaudun, France * Nitra, Slovakia * Krems an der Donau, Austria * Piekary Śląskie, Poland * Râmnicu Vâlcea, Romania * Ružomberok, Slovakia == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Official tourist website * UNESCO listing for Kroměříž Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Zlín Region
title: Kroměříž
